channel.title: Help with Dissiparing objects

item.title: Help with Dissiparing objects
item.dc:creator: @lukeroge lukeroge
item.description:
@lukeroge wrote:

Help!
In My server lots of objects (one portal, a repair locker, a table +more) appear when i log in but than dissapper 1-2 seconds later!
i can show u pics if it helps

The code For The locker is
makeGlobalObject(2021, 4825, 11246, -3, 10); and
}
if (objectID == 11246) { // Trawler
if (actionTimer == 0) {
addItem(1941, 1);
addItem(960, 3);
sendMessage(“You take swamp paste and a plank out of the repair locker.”);
break;

Read full topic
